=?ISO-2022-JP?B?GyRCJDQzTkcnJCo0aiQkJDcbKEI=?=
 =?ISO-2022-JP?B?GyRCJF4kOSEjGyhC?=
body: What derision and contempt, with both sexes, attend IMPOTENCE; while the unhappy object is regarded as one deprived of so capital a pleasure in life, and at the same time, as disabled from communicating it to others. BARRENNESS in women, being also a species of INUTILITY, is a reproach, but not in the same degree: of which the reason is very obvious, according to the present theory.
